text: it is, that seems to be the consensus of most people who ever played the thing. Don't wait man your missing out. With all the great RPGs ive ever played, its the best and its not even close. Behind that theres some final fantasy games, breath of fire III, parasite eve, Metal Gear Solid, some others im not thinking of, and then theres Shadow Hearts Covenant. It shatters the barriers between the real world and the game in a profound way thats only been achieved before in games like the original metal gears. Makes you question your own life and the world. Without spoiling too much... you should really probably stop procrastinating with that oh so important job of your and play this game.
